item.title: Vaccine Integrity Project Fills Information Gap
item.description: Experts’ review of nearly 600 studies affirmed value of vaccines for respiratory infection prevention. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Managing Times of Transition in Asthma Patients
item.description: When transitioning from pediatrics to an adult setting, younger populations require closer guidance. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Indoor Air Cleaners More Hype Than Hope for Stopping Illness
item.description: Patients may be interested in buying air cleaning tech they see online. But the benefits are tenuous at best for flu and cold season. Medscape Medical...

item.title: When it Comes to COPD Symptoms, Are Patients What They Eat?
item.description: Can the Mediterranean diet address your COPD patient’s symptoms? Medscape Medical News

item.title: Are Unlabeled Allergens Lurking in French Foods?
item.description: Authors suggest these foods should be considered risks for anaphylaxis and labeled accordingly in Europe. Medscape Medical News
